name: Treasure of a Blizzard
description: "Treasure of blizzard" is a fantasy themed visual novel inspiring with beautiful arts and interesting game characters. The fate of the protagonist completely depends on your choice. Probably your character may meet his partner in life; however he may also meet the end of his life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.2 Ghz  AMD or Intel Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: i really enjoyed this VN, i loved a lot of the characters, the game has tons of branching paths which is always a plus for me in these sort of games, the music was very atmospheric, The Artstyle is really unique, my favorite routes were Lin's so far. its just super cute <3 i would definetely recommend buying this game.
